body.name: Garmin 010-N2036-06 Refurbished Drive 52 Automotive GPS with US/Canada Maps
features: Simple on-screen Menus and bright easy-to-see maps
History database of notable historic sites and U S National parks directory
Map updates included preloaded street maps for the U S And Canada
body.description: Garmin Drive 52 includes preloaded street maps for the U S Canada Puerto Rico Virgin Islands Cayman Islands and Bahamas Easily update maps and software using Garmin Express Pair this navigator with the BC 30 Wireless backup camera (sold separately Professional installation recommended) to see vehicles pedestrians and other obstacles right on the navigator's display as you reverse.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We make products that are engineered on the inside for life on the outside. We do this so our customers can make the most of the time they spend pursuing their passions. Our Mission To be an enduring company by creating superior products for automotive, aviation, marine, outdoor, and sports that are an essential part of our customers’ lives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and affordable product
reviews.reviewText: I bought a 3 weeks before, it is a refurbished one. It works fantastic. Accurate road, Traffic light heads up, Control over driving speed limit as you change lane or area or zone. Affordable for students. Mounting fixture is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as good as new
reviews.reviewText: i had to buy 2 and they work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good buy despite some GUI intuitive issues.
reviews.reviewText: When I opened up the box it came with the GPS, Power cord (which is sufficiently long enough), a USB cable (which is a little too short), and a manual.As I am one of those who basically takes the manual and tosses it out the window I set it on my weighted mount, plugged it in, and it already acquired enough satellites to function.I did a basic configuration, set a location, and I was on my way. Initially it only showed the road name I was on, however, as I turned street numbers started popping up.One little neat thing I noticed I had enabled is the fact that I had enabled a "tracking" function so you can see where you were.Once I hit my first destination, I plugged my home address in, and then wanted to add Wal-Mart into the trip and it took a while as I do not know my way around the GUI yet.Once I figured out how to do a multistop trip, it was pretty much a done deal and landed me at Wal-Mart and then literally at my Door step.What I really like about this GPS is its overall size. It is very compact, slim, light weight, and was a breeze to put on my device pad for my dashboard. As you will see in the photos it fits nicely on a pad designed for a 7" GPS.The biggest downfalls that this GPS has is a legacy USB connector, the GUI is clumbsy for your average user who doesn't read manuals or gets frustrated easily, unless you use the arrows on the left side of the screen or have a very steady finger you will find yourself having issues with some of the menus and manipulation of the map.Overall I really like this GPS, it serves its purpose, its easy to do basic functions, and the fact that it is a referb is even better since it wont end up as scrap.Worth the money personally!Update: While I do like the GPS, I had to do a factory reset on it to fix some of the routing issues. Unfortunately it still has routing issues as it appears to prefer major roads over anything else and requires you to manually bypass the routing by adding your own routing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GPS muy bueno
reviews.reviewText: Me agrado mucho fácil de entender pues así busco ciertos productos gracias.Ahorita lo tengo en el carro y aquí está lloviendo por eso no le tomé foto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The GPS had me on parallel road.The typing feature didn't work correctly.I spent the extra $10 and got a new, same model Garmin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why pay for a new one? This refubished unit has no flaws!!!
reviews.reviewText: I liked the price of refurbished units and was prepared to see some physical flaw on the unit, or a defective pixel (or three) on the screen. Nothing. This unit seems brand new and comes with free updates for life. What a deal! Don't sit on the fence over whether you should buy one or not. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as good as a cell phone
reviews.reviewText: It works well most of the time, but some of the maps are a little outdated. I have punched in addresses and it can't find them when my cell phone can. You sometimes have to be very specific on the address to get it to pull up. I am used to typing on my cell phone with predictive typing and this does not have that. You have to type in all the letters, which can be frustrating when you are used to the other way. I also make a lot of mistakes when typing because the keys are small and my fingers are large. The suction cup pops off the window if it sits in the sun. Otherwise, I do like this little unit. it doesn't take up much room and I like not having to plug my phone into my car to get navigation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a refurbished product it works great. I love that it gives you the speed limit and how fast you're going, if you go over the speed limit it will ding like a bell. Easy to use. It's quick and for the size of the Garmin it doesn't interfere with your viewing of driving

reviews.reviewTitle: Producto de acuerdo a lo especificado
reviews.reviewText: Producto de acuerdo a lo especificado
Trabaja muy bien, mas sensible y rapidao que el que tenia
No hay forma de cargar mapas desde Wikiloc o de algún otro lado. No cumplió con lo que se requería.
